firstTimeGreeting.content: Hey! Welcome to Samurai Chef! I'm super excited that you called! Can you guess what we're doing today?
Today we're visiting Sensei Sushi and his right-hand cook, Chef Arthur! They run a Japanese restaurant and make food, samurai style! I heard they need some new apprentices. Let's go find out more!
Greetings, Chef Arthur! This is my friend. We're here to learn Sensei's ways!
Hello! Is that so? It's the reason I moved here from Britain years ago! First, I have one question: do you like... sushi
Excellent! As you know, Sensei is the wisest, most skilled sushi samurai in the world! But his passion is also to teach others. Do you have what it takes to learn from a master?
Oh yeah! Let's prove to Chef Arthur and Sensei Sushi that we can become Sushi Masters!  Alexa, tell us the available paths!

playerWithAwardsGreeting.content: Welcome back to Samurai Chef! I'm so happy to see you again....Alexa, please give our friend a royal greeting!
%titles%. You have %low_color% belt Chef, %mid_color% belt Sumo, %high_color% belt Guru.

exitPhrase.content: I had lots of fun with you! Let's do this again soon!
